comment: This is an example repository configuration file. In the multi-tenant version, repository selection is managed per-user through the UI and stored in Cloudflare KV. This file is for reference only.

notes.fullName: The repository's full name in 'owner/repo' format
notes.stars: Number of stars the repository has
notes.selected: Whether the user has selected this repo to track (managed in UI)

userStorageFormat.comment: In the multi-tenant version, user repo selections are stored in Cloudflare KV with the following structure:
userStorageFormat.notes: Array of repository full names (owner/repo format)
